Class SpaceObjectDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceObjectDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpaceObject

    public abstract class SpaceObjectDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpaceObject
    This describes what a SpaceObject decorator needs to do. The 'default' behavior is to have the underlying SpaceObject (here named decoratedObject) implement all the behavior (that is, to delegate all behavior to decoratedObject, but specific decorators will override this.
    Author:
    sdexter72
